ygData.subject: Re: [gladiator] Size of teams
ygData.msgSnippet: aye, a more competant AI would make larger teams a lot stronger than single characters.  It wolud be nice if you could give orders to your team to determine

aye, a more competant AI would make larger teams a lot stronger than
single characters.  It wolud be nice if you could give orders to your
team to determine how they would behave, ie "go kill stuff", "stay
alive", "defend me", ect.  I usually use the "sommon defence" option,
but that's all you have, either yell for help, which works only kind of,
or don't.  Then your clueless teamates usually just go die.

ComtriS@... wrote:
> 
> A one person team is the best only because you can control that character.
> With a team with more than one character either you let the AI suck, as
> usual, or you constantly switch between characters to make sure they do what
> you want them to do.  Even then it's hard to completely make a large number
> of characters on a team win consistently.
> 
> Later,
> Tristan
